overview:
Chris Prouty is a former freelance journalist with an emphasis in ecommerce and retail, and current agency-side public relations professional.

He has extensive knowledge in media relations and editorial writing, having spanned a career in both sides of the media equation; journalism and media relations. An expert in ecommerce, Chris has seen (and written about) the rise of Amazon and eBay, the advent of the flash sale, and the steady consolidation of daily deal businesses.

In former career incarnations, Chris was an editorial fashion model, appearing in major magazines and brand campaigns for television. He was also an assistant research analyst for a leading genetics lab, doing DNA analysis.

Chris has a B.A. cum laude in neuroscience and creative writing from the University of Louisville in Kentucky.
